0000 # 并非空指令
6000 # 0100 00 00 0000000 load r00 a0000
1001 # 0001 00 00 0000000 show r00 0
6501 # 0100 01 01 0000001 load 01 0001
1501 # 0001 01 01 0000001 show r00 0
0180 # 0000 00 01 10 000000 alu $r10 = $r00 | $ r01
1801 # 0001 10 00 0000001 show r10 1
0181 # $r10 = $r00 & $ r01
1800 # 0001 10 00 0000001 show r10 0
0182 # $r10 = $r00 + $ r01
1801 # 0001 10 00 0000001 show r10 1
0183 # $r10 = $r00 - $ r01
1800 # 0001 10 00 0000001 show r10 0
0184 # $r10 = $r00 << $ r01
1801 # 0001 10 00 0000001 show r10 1
0185 # $r10 = $r00 >> $ r01
1800 # 0001 10 00 0000001 show r10 0
0186 # $r10 = $r00 >>(算术) $ r01
1801 # 0001 10 00 0000001 show r10 1
0187 # $r10 = ($r00 < $ r01)? 1:0
1800 # 0001 10 00 0000001 show r10 0
c000
